e9289ec0-4097-4717-9c91-4187d811e270.description: The Stratus 99.999 Certified Professionals Program is a global certification program available to employees of Stratus, Customers and Business Partners. 207bb6a8-45cf-4389-95d4-73f72b3a90f8.description: The ztC Technical Support Troubleshooting course provides post-sale field service and support engineers an advanced technical foundation of the ztC Edge system, features, and theory of operation. Major Topics include: Technical overview Theory of operation Fault handling Analyzing alarms Networking protocols.
207bb6a8-45cf-4389-95d4-73f72b3a90f8.name: Stratus ztC Edge Technical Support Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: The ztC Technical Support Troubleshooting course provides post-sale field service and support engineers an advanced technical foundation of the ztC Edge system, features, and theory of operation. 2921290a-74e9-4e4d-a3e6-311b14961b1d.description: Holders of this credential have established the qualities of being a Stratus Certified Service Provider – ztC Edge, and in addition have demonstrated deep technical understanding in Stratus everRun technology running on CentOS, checkpoint processing, and hardware redundancy technology. A Stratus Certified Service Provider is responsible for contracting directly with its End Users, including managing contract renewals.
2921290a-74e9-4e4d-a3e6-311b14961b1d.name: Stratus Certified Service Provider - ztC Edge

e441fcae-5cb5-475c-bf79-b598e6b808f0.description: The everRun Certified Implementation Specialist (SCIS) certification is awarded after completion of the everRun Site Preparation, Installation, and System Administration training course, which provides post-sale field service and support engineers with the technical knowledge and hands-on experience required to install and administer everRun. Upon completion of the course, successfully passing the course exam will certify the participant as an everRun Certified Implementation Specialist.
e441fcae-5cb5-475c-bf79-b598e6b808f0.name: Stratus Certified Implementation Specialist (SCIS)

8611ffd5-6e14-41ff-9ce6-a8d76199b6f3.description: A Stratus Authorized Service Provider is responsible for managing customer service contracts and the provision of Stratus services to customers within their assigned Territory. 7794148d-e547-4034-bf86-0da2d86f46f1.description: The Stratus everRun Certified Support Specialist (SCSS) certification is awarded after completion of the 2-day everRun Service Provider Essentials and Advanced Topics training course, which provides post-sale field service and support engineers with the technical knowledge and hands-on experience required to configure, diagnose and support solutions.
